page.title: 14Home Life In Norton Area.
page.content: {Washing. } We put the dirty clothes in the washing machine, then in the spin drier. Some people have automatic machines which wash and spin the clothes. After this we hang the clothes on the line , then iron them with an electric iron. Finally we put them in the airing cupboard. {Heating. } In our homes we use oil fired or solid fuel central heating, or electric storage heaters,open fires and electric fires. Extra heating in severe winter weather may be provided by bottle gas or paraffin heaters, and these are also useful in power cuts. In cold weather we may use electric blankets on our beds.
